amendment.description: To revise the criminal penalty provisions of the bill as reported, and for other purposes.

vote.text: Amendment SA 1893 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 1893 proposed by Senator Hatch. (consideration: CR S13027-13032; text: CR S13027-13028) To revise the criminal penalty provisions of the bill as reported, and for other purposes.
